title: T206 set vg/ex - ex RAW -- 70% remains
author: scottglevy

posts.post_title: T206 set vg/ex - ex RAW -- 70% remains
posts.post_content:
Many of the highest value cards have been sold but some, especially regular HOF and SLers remain.  

Will entertain offers on sizable purchases but not looking to sell individual singles at the moment.  One of the nicest raw sets that you will find.

This set is very consistently vg/ex - ex and is probably 10% ex/mt or better including a small handful of NM cards.  No bad cards...except for Young Portrait (tape stain).

Serious inquiries only please....

email to [url]scottglevy@yahoo.com[/url]

Good luck with the sale Scott. 

Just curious is it a 518 or 520 set? Any rarer backs?

Thanks Todd!

520.  Demmitt is around vg/ex but has significant tobacco staining.  O'Hara is around vg/ex as well without the staining.  Decent selection on the mild-moderately tough backs, but removed any that were rarer than Hindu.

Best,
Scott
This set is sparkling. Better in person than through scans !!

Saw this set at the National is is the finest raw compilation set I have ever seen.  Scott it is Barry Wilson here.  I bought the 86 Fleer Basketball off of you.  Good luck with the sale

Best

Barry

Adam and Barry,

Thanks for your very kind words.  I share your view that this is one of the better raw lots out there.  

To all who have responded...
Thank you very much for your interest.  I have been / am getting back to all.  If you haven't received a response within a few days, please accept my apologies and just shoot me a reminder email. 

Warm regards,
Scott

Update:

Significant portion of set is now PENDING (sold).  I will entertain inquires for medium to large lots of individual cards - roughly 70% of set remains. 

Thanks 
Scott
